revision.text:
{{Actor| | type = Interactive object | name = Heart of D'Sparil pedestal | class = ZGemPedestal | game = Hexen | doomednum = 9012 }}[[Classes]]: [[Classes:SwitchableDecoration|SwitchableDecoration]]→[[Classes:SwitchingDecoration|SwitchingDecoration]]→<u>ZGemPedestal</u>
A pedestal on which the {{Class|PuzzGemBig|Heart of D'Sparil}} gem must be placed. ==== [[DECORATE]] definition ==== ACTOR <u>ZGemPedestal</u> : {{Class|SwitchingDecoration}} { {{Property|Radius}} 10 {{Property|Height}} 40 +{{Flag|SOLID}} States { Spawn: GMPD A -1 Stop Active: GMPD B -1 Stop } }
